metadata.Title: CVE-2009-0165 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
Integer overflow in the JBIG2 decoder in Xpdf 3.02pl2 and earlier, as used in Poppler and other products, when running on Mac OS X, has unspecified impact, related to "g*allocn."

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2009-0165` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

xpdf - 3.02-2
No subscription required

notes.Note: jdstrand> per mdeslaur, poppler and xpdf not-affected sbeattie> ipe uses system pdflatex

criterions.comment: libextractor package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
xpdf package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.02-2').
